pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa pūgassa saṃghassa sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyattaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.4: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.9: “Bahū, āvuso, saṃghassa dāyakā, bahū saṃghassa bhattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.10: Ime tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.11: Tumhe ce imesaṃ na dassatha, atha ko carahi imesaṃ dassati?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.13: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṃ cīvaraṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā saṃghaṃ bhattena parivisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.14: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṃghassa sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyattaṃ “na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dinnan”ti te evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.17: Yathāpaṭiyattaṃ cīvaraṃ ayyā chabbaggiyā ayyānaṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ pariṇāmesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.18: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.20: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.21: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.24: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.25: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.26: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1.27: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.7: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.13: “dassāma karissāmā”ti vācā bhinnā hoti, taṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.1: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.2: Pariṇate vematiko puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.4: Saṃghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṃghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.5: Cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṃghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.6: Puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṃghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
